message:
Spectra presents to you 'ARTBEAT', the Annual Art Exhibition of IIT Kharagpur. 
Experience with us, the possibilities of other worlds.

5th April || 7 pm-10 pm
6th - 7th April, 2019 || 10 am- 10 pm
Assembly Hall, Gymkhana
#Artbeat2019 #Whereisyourmind

To submit your artworks for the Exhibition, fill out this form www.tinyurl.com/artbeat2019

message:
Artbeat is at hand and its the perfect opportunity to showcase your artworks alongside others. Whether you are an in-class doodler or a hidden artist, Spectra The Fine Arts and Design Group of IIT Kharagpur, invites you to submit your artworks for 'Artbeat', the annual art exhibition of IIT Kharagpur.

To submit your artworks fill out this form : https://tinyurl.com/Artbeat2019
Artbeat gives all creative and artistic people a platform to showcase their work in this exhibition. 
Traditional art, Digital art, Photography or any other form of art is welcomed.

Traditional art, Digital art, Photography or any other form of art is welcomed.

Spectra hosted Wall-De-Art in line with hall days.
Rules:
1. The canvas must be the wall.
2. Maximum 3 persons are allowed for an entry.
3. Only the painting must be present in the photo submitted.
4. People's choice award- Maximum likes and comments on original post by spectra page
Critics award- By judges

Spectra is hosting Wall-De-Art in line with hall days.
These are the submissions for Wall De Art 2k19 so far. If you have something to share as well, you can still send it to us till 29th March 2019.
Go to <https://goo.gl/forms/HiwvNpGs7a3gpmO02> and fill up the form to submit your entries.

Rules:
1. The canvas must be the wall.
2. Maximum 3 persons are allowed for an entry.
3. Only the painting must be present in the photo submitted.
4. People's choice award- Maximum likes and comments on original post by spectra page

message:
Hall day Season is here along with a chance for you unleash your creativity on the walls and a chance to win exciting goodies. 
Spectra is taking entries for Wall-de-art wall painting online competition.

Go to <https://goo.gl/forms/HiwvNpGs7a3gpmO02> and fill up the form to submit your entries.

Rules:
1. The canvas must be the wall.
2. Maximum 3 persons are allowed for an entry.
3. Only the painting must be present in the photo submitted.
4. People's choice award- Maximum likes and comments on original post by spectra page
Critics award- By judges
Deadline: 29th March

message:
"Drawing is not what one sees but what one can make others see." -Edgar Degas
Spectra conducted an internal live sketching workshop for its members to give them a chance to explore this side of art. Here are few snaps of the workshop.

message:
"Today we not only celebrate the lovers who are happily together..
We also celebrate the lovers who are away from their loved ones and still cherish each other as much...... 
Absence sharpens love, presence strengthens it."

Happy Valentines' Day!

message: Spectra, IIT Kharagpur shared Branding And Relations Cell, IIT Kharagpur's post. "Art washes away from the soul the dust of everyday life." -Pablo Picasso Spectra- The Fine Arts and Design Group of IIT Kharagpur aims to strengthen and promote the roots of fine arts among the students by bringing together like-minded people in the campus who have a love for art and different art forms and have the interest to learn and discover new genres of art. Read more about Spectra, IIT Kharagpur at the link below: http://www.barc.iitkgp.ac.in/blog/index.php/2018/11/01/spectra-the-fine-arts-and-design-group-of-iit-kharagpur/

message:
Spectra is celebrating the World Origami Days from 24th Oct to 11th Nov.
So we encourage everyone to fold, fold and fold.😅
We recently had an Artjam of origami in which basic folding techniques and models were taught.Here are some of the glimpses of the fun we had during the Artjam!!! <3

message:
Here are some of the glimpses of the latest event catered by Spectra specially for school kids: ARTBUD - Painting Competition for kidos. Event was graced by the presence of Professor William Mohanty, President of Technology Student Gymkhana, IIT Kharagpur, who came and praised the work of budding artists. 
We divided the students into 3 categories : 
Category 1: Class 1st to 5th 
Category 2: Class 6th to 8th
Category 3: Class 9th and 10th

The winners in each category are:

Category 1: Class 1st to 5th
First Prize: Mayukh Pradhan (Class IV - Griffins International School) 
Second Prize: Aneek Jana (Class V - Kendriya Vidyalaya)
Third Prize: Anannya Maitra (Class IV - St. Agnes Branch School)
Special Prize : Arnab De (Class I - Griffins International School)

Category 2: Class 6th to 8th
First Prize: Somdeep Mallick (Class VII - Kendriya Vidyalaya)
Second Prize: Riddhiraj Roy (Class VI - DAV Model School)
Third Prize: Sayan Mandal (Class VIII - Griffins International School)

Category 3: Class 9th and 10th
First Prize: Meghna Mandal (Class X - DAV Model School)
Second Prize: Anushmita Bera (Class X -DAV Model School) 

Congratulations to all !! <3
story: Spectra, IIT Kharagpur added 31 new photos — with Raj Gupta and 9 others at Nalanda Class Room Complex, IIT Kharagpur.

message:
SPECTRA - The Fine Arts and Design group of IIT Kharagpur, brings to you 'ARTBUD' - The painting competition for students from class 1st to 10th standard. Students have to bring their own paint while the sheets for the painting will be provided by us.
Come and enjoy a day full of colours!
7th October 2018, Sunday.
9:30am onwards,
NR 221 & NR 222,
Nalanda complex, IIT Kharagpur.
#ARTBUD 2018 #SPECTRA
❤️

SPECTRA - The Fine Arts and Design group of IIT Kharagpur, brings to you 'ARTBUD' - The painting competition for students from class 1st to 10th standard. Students have to bring their own paint while the sheets for the painting will be provided by us.
Come and enjoy a day full of colours!
7th October 2018, Sunday.

message:
‘A drop of ink may make a million think.’
-George Gordon Bryan

Spectra, IIT Kharagpur introduces Inktober 2018.
Inktober is a challenge to improve ones inking skills by making one ink drawing everyday for the 31 days in October.
Rules for Inktober:
1. Make a drawing using ink (you can use any colour you like and you can do a pencil drawing under).
2. Post it online with the hashtag #inktober #inktober2018 #spectraiitkgp

Send us your Inktober artworks, their description and your basic information at spectra.iitkgp@gmail.com for a chance to be featured through our page.

That’s it! Now let’s create something beautiful.

‘A drop of ink may make a million think.’
-George Gordon Bryan

message:
Love creating art?
Spectra- The Fine Arts and Design Group of IIT Kharagpur is excited to bring in new members in the family.
So if you are passionate about art - in any form (Traditional, Digital or Photography) and  eager to learn more, then come for selections on Monday, 20th of August.
Inviting 1st and 2nd year students for the selections. Bring your previous artworks - soft copy/hard copy - with you if possible.
Link to the registration- https://tinyurl.com/Spectra101
Mail your entries to spectra.iitkgp@gmail.com.
Create. Make. Art.
❤️

Alumni Cell, IIT Kharagpur  is organising Art Attack in association with Spectra, IIT Kharagpur. This is a painting competition to be held in Bhatnagar Auditorium (F116) from 5 PM onwards for both students and Alumni! Students have to bring their own paint while the sheets for the painting will be provided by us.
So, come and enjoy an evening full of colours! <3

The Cartooning Workshop conducted recently by Spectra, IIT Kharagpur saw an enthusiastic participation from the students. Here are the snaps from yesterday's event. Stay tuned for many more such workshops.

message:
Ever tried to doodle characters and have struggled to start or something just seems amiss?

Spectra, IIT Kharagpur invites all the budding artists, hobbyist and aspiring cartoonist to come and learn the basics of CREATING and self-publishing COMICS!
Bring out that artistic child within you and give flight to your imagination and have lots and lots of fun. :) 
We'll see you all at S301, Main Building on 11th August. Be on time, so that you don't miss anything.
story: Spectra, IIT Kharagpur is with Nastassja Rai and Abhishek Mhatre at IIT Kharagpur.

message: Spectra, IIT Kharagpur was honoured to present a glimpse of the Art Culture in IIT Kharagpur as a part of the Cultural Program conducted in the Induction Program for freshers. The students were introduced to the diverse art forms prevailing in the campus as well as various workshops and exhibitions conducted round-the-year.
story: Spectra, IIT Kharagpur is with Siddharth Jindal at Netaji Auditorium, IIT KGP.
